Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Belmont, Racine, and Clark due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Belmont, Racine, and Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.
